reviews.review: [SPOILER FREE] Absolutely captivating in every sense of the word. This is definitely a movie about Thanos, the Avengers just exist in his world. The movie’s 2 hour and 30 minute run time is hardly noticed, as the movie takes you from location to location, apocalyptic event to apocalyptic event, at breakneck speed. You will leave the theatre mouth agape, heart racing, and tears streaming. The guts of this movie can not be overstated, Thanos is the real deal, and you can not prepare for it. I will definitely watch Infinity War again, you can not take it all in properly with one viewing. Marvel has really outdone themselves with this gem of a movie!
boring even the name is stupid

Infinity war,  trae consigo humor, inteligente y en momentos precisos cuando tuvo que ser seria lo fue,  las perdidas son dolorosas,  y el final solo te deja deseando aun mas aun incluso despues de  casi 3 horas en las cuales siempre estarás al borde del asiento esperando lo que sucederá.  Gran entrega de Marcel cumple con todo el hype creado a su alrededor
Fantastic! Everything I wanted and more. I felt satisfied, shocked, and the movie left me wanting more.

Its the most epic movie I have ever seen in my hole life. The battles, the visual effects, all the fucking references to the comics are incredible, the jokes are completely balanced, what makes this movie a fresh and enjoyable one. Also the sad and important moments are taken very serious, the only thing I wish it could be better was the explanation of new things. And thats all. for me 8.7/10

More than I could have hoped for. They really cashed in on things they set up years ago.
Not at all the outcome I expected! There were tears, laughter and just mixed feelings overall. But such a great movie and a definite must see!
